name: Drumsticks4Dead
description:
Take on the role of a kangaroo in employment at Colonel Butter's House of Fried Chicken. Zombies are coming in, and they're hungry! Fry up some chicken to prepare the tasty dish they're after, and be sure to serve it to them from a safe distance.

Controls: Escape closes application.

Player 1: WASD to move.     E to interact, and pick up objects.      Q to throw held item if it is throwable.      F to drop held item.

Player 2: Arrow keys to move.    O to interact, and pick up objects.    I to throw held item if it is throwable.     P to drop held item.

Controller: Left stock to move.   Bottom button (A on xbox or X on playstation) to interact and pick up objects.     Left button (X on xbox and square on playstation) to throw held item if it is throwable.        Right button (B on xbox or O on playstation) to drop held item.

Currently the map, zombie balance, along with some sounds and art is not finalized. Looking forward, we'd also like to add zombie types that differ more from the current simple walking forward enemies. In addition, we want to add several levels with an upgrade system as you progress through the game.

Contributors:

Archibald: Programming, Design

Esther: Art, Story

Raymond: Design, Programming
